body: I think this may be related to #859, though in my case it's not `setMenu()` that is being called, but other Menu APIs (setting checked state, enabling/disabling items).
Can you provide a reproducible example?

I haven't been able to make a reproducible test case yet, but I just had the crash happen on Mac for the first time.  He's part of the crash log:


These may be a different issue then on Windows, but it was caused by the same user action: moving through the menus.
Issue #4103 sounds related.  When the next release goes out I will test if it fixes my issue.
